name: My City Builder 3D
description:
Congratulations, you were chosen as a mayor! Now your goal is to build the city, which will be loved both by citizens and city visitors. Evolve infrastructure, think over road building and traffic, prepare everything for your people moving. My City Builder 3D is a classic building simulator, but in 3D and also with bright cartoon design.

Choose a construction to build. You can build your own empire without limitation.

My City Builder 3D game features:
• Amazing city building game genre – now in 3D;
• Cool cartoon graphics;
• Choose from different building;
• Easy-to-use controlling;
• Addictive gameplay.

My City Builder 3D adventures – are you ready? Build your first house, and you can't stop. Good luck, mayor!
